data.name: Pixel Hentai Mosaic Demo
data.detailed_description:
Pixel Hentai Mosaic will test power of your logical thinking and desire to see uncensored pixel hentai.
You need to rely on your mind, use it to complete the image of its mixed parts reveal the intrigue.

Features:
  • Original hentai pixel art drawn specially for this game
  • Modes 3x3, 4x4 and 5x5
  • 2 levels (10 levels in full version)
  • Gallery mode
  • Censor On/Off mode for letsplayers and streamers (only for 3x3 and 4x4 modes)
  • Relaxing music
data.about_the_game:
Pixel Hentai Mosaic will test power of your logical thinking and desire to see uncensored pixel hentai.

data.short_description: Solve pixel tile puzzles, reveal the intrigue in modes 3x3/4x4/5x5 and collect 100 achievements. Hentai is love, hentai is life.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista/Windows 7/Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 1.8 Ghz or AMD Athlon X2 64 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT/s 4xx or Equivalent
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 LTS
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 1.8 Ghz or AMD Athlon X2 64 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT/s 4xx or Equivalent
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: This game is not a product of pornographic nature, so there are no and never will be scenes of intercourse and (or) sexually suggestive scenes. The main function of the game is the creation of tasks (puzzles) for the solution of which the player has the opportunity to enjoy the aesthetics of a beautiful female body in a specific style of pixel art.
